title: Screen size problem
body:
i'm new here and i just installed the game but when i enter my screen goes black and says high frequency and when i try to change my screen size from the launcher it only gives me 1024x576 wt should i do to play the game

notice: my screen resolution is 1024x768 and i can't change it

replies.body:
Weird...! Hearing this, it could be an issue with your graphics card drivers vs. a resolution issue.

I suggest hitting up our Crashing guide and following [**these steps here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq2). This isn't a crashing issue, but this can help us either eliminate the problem or eliminate drivers as a potential cause for this. Hit me up with an update once you test it out! :)
